TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CounterSet extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

span.span: Defines a set of logical counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，當您完成移除您的提供者的登錄，並釋放所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。Call the method when you are finished to remove your provider's registration and to release all managed and unmanaged resources. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public CounterSet (Guid providerGuid, Guid counterSetGuid, System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceType instanceType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid providerGuid, valuetype System.Guid counterSetGuid, valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceType instanceType) cil managed
Public Sub New (providerGuid As Guid, counterSetGuid As Guid, instanceType As CounterSetInstanceType)
public: CounterSet(Guid providerGuid, Guid counterSetGuid, System::Diagnostics::PerformanceData::CounterSetInstanceType instanceType);

param.name: providerGuid
param.span: 可唯一識別計數器資料提供者的 GUID。

span.span: Guid that uniquely identifies the provider of the counter data.

param.span: 請使用資訊清單中指定的 GUID。

span.span: Use the Guid specified in the manifest.

param.name: counterSetGuid
param.span: 可唯一識別提供者之計數器集合的 GUID。

span.span: Guid that uniquely identifies the counter set for a provider.

param.span: 請使用資訊清單中指定的 GUID。

span.span: Use the Guid specified in the manifest.

param.name: instanceType
param.span: 識別計數器集合的類型，例如計數器集合是單一或多重執行個體的計數器集合。

span.span: Identifies the type of the counter set, for example, whether the counter set is a single or multiple instance counter set.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊您的提供者。Registers your provider. 呼叫方法移除註冊。Calling the method removes the registration. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

exception.span: 可用的記憶體不足，無法完成作業。

span.span: Not enough memory is available to complete the operation.

exception.span: Windows Vista 之前的版本不支援。

span.span: Not supported prior to Windows Vista.

exception.span: 其中一個參數是 NULL 或無效。

span.span: One of the parameters is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 基礎 Win32 函式呼叫失敗。

span.span: An underlying Win32 function call failed.

summary.span: 將計數器加入至計數器集合。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddCounter (int counterId, System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType counterType);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddCounter(int32 counterId, valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType counterType) cil managed
public: void AddCounter(int counterId, System::Diagnostics::PerformanceData::CounterType counterType);

param.name: counterId

span.span: Identifies the counter.

param.span: 請使用您在資訊清單中使用的同一個值來定義計數器。

span.span: Use the same value that you used in the manifest to define the counter.

param.name: counterType

span.span: Identifies the counter type.

param.span: 此計數器型別決定計數器資料的計算、求平均值及顯示等方式。

span.span: The counter type determines how the counter data is calculated, averaged, and displayed.

summary.span: 使用指定的計數器識別項和型別，將計數器加入至計數器集合。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須在建立計數器集合的執行個體前，將計數器加入至計數器集合中。You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.

exception.span: 計數器識別項已存在集合中或為負數，或者計數器型別是 NULL 或無效。

span.span: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 您不能在建立計數器集合的執行個體之後，將計數器加入至計數器集合。

span.span: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddCounter (int counterId, System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType counterType, string counterName);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddCounter(int32 counterId, valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType counterType, string counterName) cil managed
public: void AddCounter(int counterId, System::Diagnostics::PerformanceData::CounterType counterType, System::String ^ counterName);

param.name: counterId

span.span: Identifies the counter.

param.span: 請使用您在資訊清單中使用的同一個值來定義計數器。

span.span: Use the same value that you used in the manifest to define the counter.

param.name: counterType

span.span: Identifies the counter type.

param.span: 此計數器型別決定計數器資料的計算、求平均值及顯示等方式。

span.span: The counter type determines how the counter data is calculated, averaged, and displayed.

param.name: counterName

span.span: Name of the counter.

param.span: 您可以使用這個名稱，對計數器集合'執行個體中的計數器進行索引

span.span: You can use this name to index the counter in the counter set instance.
(See .)

summary.span: 使用指定的計數器識別項和型別以及計數器的顯示名稱，將計數器加入至計數器集合。

span.span: Adds a counter to the counter set by using the specified counter identifier and type and a display name for the counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須在建立計數器集合的執行個體前，將計數器加入至計數器集合中。You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

exception.span: 計數器識別項已存在集合中或為負數，或者計數器型別是 NULL 或無效。

span.span: The counter identifier already exists in the set or is negative, or the counter type is NULL or not valid.

exception.span: 您不能在建立計數器集合的執行個體之後，將計數器加入至計數器集合。

span.span: You cannot add counters to the counter set after creating an instance of the counter set.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance CreateCounterSetInstance (string instanceName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance CreateCounterSetInstance(string instanceName) cil managed
Public Function CreateCounterSetInstance (instanceName As String) As CounterSetInstance
public: System::Diagnostics::PerformanceData::CounterSetInstance ^ CreateCounterSetInstance(System::String ^ instanceName);

span.span: Name of the instance.
The name must be unique.

summary.span: 建立計數器集合的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the counter set.

returns.span: 包含計數器資料之計數器集合的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the counter set which will contain the counter data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法一次的單一執行個體的計數器集合，並且一次或多次的多個執行個體的計數器集合。Call this method one time for single-instance counter sets and one or more times for multiple-instance counter sets. 提供者會決定它會建立執行個體。The provider determines when it creates an instance. 如果多個靜態的計數器資料，提供者可以在初始化階段建立執行個體。If the counter data is more static, the provider can create an instance at initialization time. 比方說，在電腦上的處理器數目會被視為靜態的因此提供處理器的計數器資料的提供者無法在初始化階段在電腦上中建立的每個處理器執行個體。For example, the number of processors on a computer would be considered static, so a provider that provides counter data for processors could create an instance for each processor on the computer at initialization time. 是一個動態的例如磁碟或處理序計數器的計數器，提供者會建立新的執行個體，以加入新的 USB 裝置或建立新的處理序的回應。For counters that are more dynamic, such as disk or process counters, the providers would create the new instances in response to a new USB device being added or a new process being created. 提供者應該使的計數器保持在最新的資料隨時。The provider should keep the counter data up-to-date at all times. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

span.span: The instance name is NULL.

exception.span: 您必須在建立計數器集合的執行個體前，將計數器加入至計數器集合中。

span.span: You must add counters to the counter set before creating an instance of the counter set.

summary.span: 釋放這個物件所使用的資源。

span.span: Releases resources used by this object.

span.span: Releases all unmanaged resources used by this object and optionally release the managed resources.

Finalize ()

summary.span: 在記憶體回收收回物件前釋放資源。

span.span: Frees resources before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行階段會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is called automatically by the runtime.
